Ahmad El-Hajj. Group Members: Mathew
Phillip, Ramin Kurkeice
Data will be collected every 30 minutes.

Collects data and displays it in a graph over
time and keeps it stored for at least a year

The L-Wing has solar panels installed on the
roof. Humber wants to know how much
power is collected every 30 minutes. Humber
wants to access this data through a website
and an app.
The project will be split into three parts. One
member will be in charge of the UI part which
will be the app and website interface. The
second group member will be in charge of the
controller which would be the hardware part.
The third group member will be in charge of
the database. The member in charge of the
database will create a database and connect it
Choi, Charles Q. “Full Page Reload.” IEEE

Raspberry pi(min second gen ),solar-PV
panels, power optimizers, EV Charger

VMD method is the best option to complete
this assignment
